text: Bush Brothers and Company is a family-owned corporation. It is best known for its Bush's Best brand canned baked beans. The company produces approximately 80 percent of the canned baked beans consumed in the United States, representing estimated annual sales in excess of $400 million and the processing of more than 55 million pounds of beans per year. It was founded in 1908. Category:American food companies Category:1908 establishments in the United States
title: Bush Brothers and Company
